title: Game doesn't load after 100%, and this problem is not a one time thing
body: This problem also happens with my friend (Summoner Name: Sharz), the game on loading screen hits 100% on the screen and then I'm still sitting there waiting for it to load for 5 - 6 minutes, I either have to either exit the game myself or my team remakes and I receive 20 minute afk timers, Riot needs to take away the AFK timer and implement a fix for this. But if possible does anyone know a solution that I can use so this doesn't happen?
